{"id":173336811,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 years, 5 months","timestamp":1535921220,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"22 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/173336811/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        int sum = 0, left = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) sum += nums[i];\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            if (i != 0) left += nums[i - 1];\n            if (sum - left - nums[i] == left) return i;\n        }\n        \n        return -1;\n    }\n}\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
